tool_description: Zloadr Professional API endpoints for Cryptocurrency converter . This category currently includes 5 endpoints:
name: Cryptocurrency Conversions
title: Cryptocurrency Conversions

api_list.name: Monthly_Average
api_list.description: what is the average price of 1 BTC to USDT between 2018-08-05 to 2018-09-05.  pass one or more comma-separated currency Example: "BTC,ETH"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-cryptocurrency-conversions-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/monthly_average/?from=BTC&to=USDT,ETH&start_date=2018-08-05&end_date=2018-09-05"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-conversions-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert_From
api_list.description: if you have 100 BTC , how much ETH and LTC will that get you.  pass one or more comma-separated currency Example: "BTC,ETH"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-cryptocurrency-conversions-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/convert/convert_to?to=BTC&from=ETH,LTC&amount=100"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-conversions-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Historic_Rate
api_list.description: how much ETH and LTC do you need to get 100 BTC at 2018-09-05.  pass one or more comma-separated currency Example: "BTC,ETH"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-conversions-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
